name: target pistol magazine
description: A flush fitting magazine for use with target pistols, capable of feeding 10 tiny pistol cartridges.

name: high capacity target pistol magazine
description: A flush fitting magazine for use with target pistols, capable of feeding 20 tiny pistol cartridges.
A 'speedloader', a metal block capable of holding and releasing ammunition to aid in loading revolvers.  Accepts 8 standard tiny pistol cartridges.
